name: Pippa vs. The Rrat King
description:
This project was a birthday present for VTuber Pipkin Pippa, which was streamed on March 3rd/4th, 2022.

SYNOPSIS

Pipkin Pippa has found herself in an unfortunate situation: there are rumors being spread about her that can hurt her! Having to travel to Downtown in search of answers, she crosses paths with a person swearing to destroy her career...

STAFF

  • Director/Art/Scenario/Additional Programming/GUI: Kamigigana
  • Lead Programming/Quality Assurance/Sound Design/GUI: Brimbel
  • Additional Art: Aegis (Iori), Fridge (Ashelia "Lia"), Kuruko Imai (Uruka), Bingo Panic (Tenma), Taotwist (Michiru), Tifastits (Nasa)

CONTENT NOTICES

  • Mild Blood
  • Profanity
